original_text: So he pretended to be insane in their presence; and while he was in their hands he acted like a madman, making marks on the doors of the gate and letting saliva run down his beard.
korean_text: 그들 앞에서 그의 행동을 변하여 미친 체하고 대문짝에 그적거리며 침을 수염에 흘리매

sentences.original_text: So he pretended to be insane
and while he was in their hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 그들의 손에 있을 동안
